content.text: Match ends, Villarreal B 2, Recreativo 0.
Second Half ends, Villarreal B 2, Recreativo 0.
Goal!  Villarreal B 2, Recreativo 0. Mubarak Wakaso (Villarreal B) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Marcos Gullón.
Attempt saved. Mubarak Wakaso (Villarreal B) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marquitos.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Diego Mariño.
